name: Borderlands 2: The Horrible Hunger of the Ravenous Wattle Gobbler
name_original: Borderlands 2: The Horrible Hunger of the Ravenous Wattle Gobbler
description:
Borderlands 2: The Horrible Hunger of the Ravenous Wattle Gobbler is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It came out on 26-11-2013. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Borderlands 2: The Horrible Hunger of the Ravenous Wattle Gobbler on PC and PlayStation 3.
